name: Dental Assistants_Mar.2023
description: The Dental Assistants Collection represents the necessary skills for dental assistants. This collection of skills was developed in partnership with a panel of subject matter experts who have worked as dental assistants or have supervised them.
creator: https://credentialengineregistry.org/resources/ce-036d082d-d80e-41a7-99a0-2d63a4ad3a4a
author: Western Governors University
